form.title: Title:
form.pwd-instructions:
Password requirements:
- minimum 8 characters
- minimum 1 upper and 1 lower case letter
- minimum 1 digit or special character

formErrors.oneUpperLetter: Has at least one uppercase letter
formErrors.oneLowerLetter: Has at least one lowercase letter
formErrors.oneDigitOrSpecial: Has at least one digit or one special character
formErrors.number: Please enter a number (integer or decimal, without space)
formErrors.textarea: Allowed: letters, spaces and the following characters: ',.:;"/+-?!#%()
formErrors.userAlreadyExists2: An user with the same email address already exists !
formErrors.unexpectedErrorMsg: An error occurred, please try again
formErrors.integerRange: Must be an integer between 0 and 299 (or empty)

print.warning: (*check the orientation (portrait) and margins (default) in the print window if the rendering is not correct)
